articles.title: How this major city became one of America’s most affordable for home buyers
articles.description:
While there are many yardsticks for calculating housing affordability, Pittsburgh stands out as uniquely livable.

The post How this major city became one of America’s most affordable for home buyers appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Pittsburgh is recognized as one of America's most affordable cities for home buyers.
Housing affordability metrics highlight Pittsburgh's unique livability compared to Boston.
Boston residents may consider relocating to Pittsburgh for more affordable housing options.

articles.title: Boston ranks among best U.S. cities for Thanksgiving — and tops New England
articles.description:
Boston was the only New England city to make WalletHub’s list of the top 100 Thanksgiving destinations — and its restaurant scene helped secure a top 20 spot.

The post Boston ranks among best U.S. cities for Thanksgiving — and tops New England appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Boston ranks in the top 20 Thanksgiving destinations in the U.S.
WalletHub's list highlights Boston's vibrant restaurant scene as a key factor.
Boston is the only New England city recognized, boosting local tourism.

articles.title: Five years after debuting ‘Java with Jimmy,’ host James Hills isn’t slowing down
articles.description:
Hills spoke to Boston.com about community building, whether he would ever run for office, the future of his show, and much more.

The post Five years after debuting ‘Java with Jimmy,’ host James Hills isn’t slowing down appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: James Hills continues to engage Boston residents through his show 'Java with Jimmy'.
Hills has been hosting the show for five years, fostering community connections.
He discusses potential political aspirations, indicating a commitment to local issues.

articles.title: Roman Anthony earns a third place finish for AL Rookie of the Year
articles.description:
"He's a great at-bat, he's a great baserunner. The kid became a monster in the outfield, he was a plus defender."

The post Roman Anthony earns a third place finish for AL Rookie of the Year appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Roman Anthony finished third in AL Rookie of the Year voting for 2025.
Anthony showcased strong skills as a defender and baserunner throughout the season.
His performance boosts optimism for the Boston Red Sox's future prospects.

articles.title: Federal judge orders release of Fitchburg woman detained by ICE in viral video
articles.description:
Juliana Milena Ojeda Montoya’s husband appeared to suffer a seizure last week as ICE agents arrested her during a traffic stop.

The post Federal judge orders release of Fitchburg woman detained by ICE in viral video appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Federal judge ordered the release of Juliana Milena Ojeda Montoya from ICE detention.
Ojeda Montoya was arrested during a traffic stop while her husband suffered a seizure.
The incident highlights ongoing concerns about ICE operations in Boston and community safety.
